column4: anybody had issues getting a supreme fx 2 sound card to work?
the thing don't even show up in lspci
are there unidentified devices? could you pastebin your lspci?
wow. i have no idea then
if it don't show up in lspci couldn't we assume the thing is off or disabled somehow?
have you tried another OS on this machin?
not me personally, over at a neighbors, he said it worked on win
i suppose you could go poking around in the bios
or reseat the card, thank you
